entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:08 a.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 3:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: ESE 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
